He will attend General Kurilla's farewell ceremony, following Kurilla's Pakistan trip. Despite protests from Imran Khan's supporters, the US seeks to re-engage with Pakistan's military due to regional instability.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-asim-munir-to-visit-us-a-second-time-in-2-months/articleshow/123173696.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-asim-munir-to-visit-us-a-second-time-in-2-months/articleshow/123173696.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 00:13:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>OMER FAROOQ KHAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="921051" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123173698,imgsize-921051.cms"/></item><item><title>'Captain Cool meets Music Sensation’: Watch Dhoni play padel with Anirudh</title><description><![CDATA[MS Dhoni launched his sports venture, 7Padel, in Chennai, highlighted by a friendly padel match with music composer Anirudh Ravichander. The facility features padel and pickleball courts, a pool, gym, and more. Dhoni aims to popularize padel, emphasizing its accessibility for all, hoping 7Padel becomes a hub for athletes and families in Chennai.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/captain-cool-meets-music-sensation-viral-video-of-ms-dhoni-playing-padel-with-anirudh-steals-the-show-watch/articleshow/123178089.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/captain-cool-meets-music-sensation-viral-video-of-ms-dhoni-playing-padel-with-anirudh-steals-the-show-watch/articleshow/123178089.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 07:42:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="13558" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123178111,imgsize-13558.cms"/></item><item><title>Typos, technicalities used to deny citizenship claims in Assam: Report</title><description><![CDATA[A new report scrutinizes the legal processes of Foreigners Tribunals and the Gauhati High Court in Assam, revealing that over 1.6 lakh people were declared "foreigners" based on minor discrepancies in documents and dismissed oral testimonies. The report highlights how crucial documents were rejected due to formatting flaws and inconsistencies, leading to a burgeoning crisis of rights violations and exclusion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/typos-technicalities-used-to-deny-citizenship-claims-in-assam-report/articleshow/123176575.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/typos-technicalities-used-to-deny-citizenship-claims-in-assam-report/articleshow/123176575.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 05:31:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>HIMANSHI DHAWAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1764543" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123176613,imgsize-1764543.cms"/></item><item><title>'Saiyaara': Ahaan Panday starrer ends week 3 with Rs 308 crore haul</title><description><![CDATA[Mohit Suri's 'Saiyaara,' starring Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, is experiencing a slowdown after a record-breaking start. The romantic drama's collections dipped to Rs 1.85 crore on its third Thursday. Despite this, 'Saiyaara' has grossed a solid Rs 308.45 crore in India and crossed Rs 507 crore globally, becoming the highest-grossing Indian love story.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-21-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-ends-week-3-with-rs-308-crore-haul/articleshow/123176796.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-21-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-ends-week-3-with-rs-308-crore-haul/articleshow/123176796.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 06:02:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57316" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123176768,imgsize-57316.cms"/></item><item><title>ED need not act like crook while probing crooks: SC</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court cautioned the Enforcement Directorate (ED) against employing unlawful tactics during PMLA investigations, emphasizing adherence to legal procedures. Justices highlighted the low conviction rate in ED's PMLA cases, suggesting the establishment of fast-track courts to expedite trials. The court also addressed concerns about cryptocurrency's potential for money laundering, advocating for its regulation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-need-not-act-like-crook-while-probing-crooks-sc/articleshow/123174867.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-need-not-act-like-crook-while-probing-crooks-sc/articleshow/123174867.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 02:08:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1445974" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174871,imgsize-1445974.cms"/></item><item><title>Study reveals eating French fries can increase risk of Type 2 diabetes</title><description><![CDATA[A recent study published in The BMJ reveals that consuming French fries three times a week can increase the risk of Type 2 diabetes by 20%. However, replacing French fries with whole grains can lower the risk by 19%. The research emphasizes the importance of considering food preparation methods and choosing healthier carbohydrate sources to mitigate diabetes risk. Read more below!]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/study-reveals-eating-french-fries-can-increase-the-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-by-a-shocking-percentage/articleshow/123169077.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/study-reveals-eating-french-fries-can-increase-the-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-by-a-shocking-percentage/articleshow/123169077.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 20:19:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35124" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123169184,imgsize-35124.cms"/></item><item><title>US tariffs: PM's readiness to pay 'personal price' marks escalation of resistance</title><description><![CDATA[PM Modi staunchly opposed US President Trump's increased tariffs on Indian goods, particularly in response to India's stance on Russian oil purchases. Modi asserted India's unwavering commitment to protecting its farmers, dairy farmers, and fishermen, even if it meant personal repercussions. He emphasized self-reliance and national pride, rejecting US demands for access to India's agriculture, dairy, and fishery sectors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-protect-our-farmers-ready-to-pay-heavy-price-for-it-pm-modi/articleshow/123175176.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-protect-our-farmers-ready-to-pay-heavy-price-for-it-pm-modi/articleshow/123175176.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 03:18:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>VISHWA MOHAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="717485" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175184,imgsize-717485.cms"/></item><item><title>Show of opposition unity at Rahul Gandhi's dinner</title><description><![CDATA[Top INDIA bloc leaders convened at Rahul Gandhi's residence for dinner, reinforcing unity amid parliamentary protests over electoral roll reviews. Rahul presented findings on voter list manipulation, while Tejashwi Yadav outlined plans for a statewide protest in Bihar. Discussions also covered Jammu & Kashmir's statehood and unfilled Rajya Sabha seats, highlighting alliance solidarity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/show-of-opposition-unity-at-rahul-gandhis-dinner/articleshow/123174934.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/show-of-opposition-unity-at-rahul-gandhis-dinner/articleshow/123174934.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 02:41:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1406032" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174944,imgsize-1406032.cms"/></item><item><title>Adolescent romance can't be grounds to lower age of consent: Government</title><description><![CDATA[The Centre informed the Supreme Court that lowering the age of consent from 18 to 16 would endanger young girls, making them vulnerable to predators both within and outside their families.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/adolescent-romance-cant-be-grounds-to-lower-age-of-consent-government/articleshow/123176378.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/adolescent-romance-cant-be-grounds-to-lower-age-of-consent-government/articleshow/123176378.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 05:16:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1314216" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123176435,imgsize-1314216.cms"/></item><item><title>Weight loss: Fat loss coach reveals 5 morning habits that can speed up the process</title><description><![CDATA[Lifestyle influencers highlight the importance of morning habits. Metabolic Fat Loss Coach Tegan Michelle shares five tips for weight loss. These include drinking lemon or apple cider vinegar water. Also, getting sunlight, stretching, and eating a protein-rich breakfast are important. Managing stress through meditation is also crucial. These habits help regulate metabolism and reduce cravings. Read below to know more!]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/weight-loss/weight-loss-fat-loss-coach-reveals-5-morning-habits-that-can-speed-up-the-process/articleshow/123173899.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/weight-loss/weight-loss-fat-loss-coach-reveals-5-morning-habits-that-can-speed-up-the-process/articleshow/123173899.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 00:36:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39298" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174097,imgsize-39298.cms"/></item><item><title>Jaz Agassi’s sweet support for dad Andre Agassi — Steffi Graf moment resurfaces</title><description><![CDATA[Andre Agassi addressed Shore Capital Partner’s Leadership Academy in New York City on July 14, 2025, emphasizing leadership, mindset, and purpose. Following the fireside chat with Jish Bia, Agassi's daughter, Jaz, expressed her admiration on Instagram. Agassi has previously discussed parenting and his efforts to break negative cycles, highlighting his and Steffi Graf's influence on their children.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/andre-agassi-and-steffi-grafs-daughter-jaz-shows-sweet-support-for-dads-thoughtful-leadership-speech/articleshow/123152346.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/andre-agassi-and-steffi-grafs-daughter-jaz-shows-sweet-support-for-dads-thoughtful-leadership-speech/articleshow/123152346.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 05:24:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1061307" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123152326,imgsize-1061307.cms"/></item><item><title>Travis Kelce era fading: Andy Reid taps Noah Gray; Chiefs’ TE future takes shape</title><description><![CDATA[Kansas City Chiefs are preparing for the future as coach Andy Reid names Noah Gray as Travis Kelce's likely successor at training camp. Despite Kelce's ongoing performance and contract, the team acknowledges his eventual retirement. Gray, with the team since 2021, is showing promise, building on a strong 2024 season.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-final-countdown-begins-after-andy-reid-picks-noah-gray-to-carry-tight-end-legacy/articleshow/123127693.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-final-countdown-begins-after-andy-reid-picks-noah-gray-to-carry-tight-end-legacy/articleshow/123127693.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 03:04:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="58908" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123127690,imgsize-58908.cms"/></item><item><title>Battlefield 6 Twitch Drops: Unlock Skins & Rewards — How to Claim Them All (Full Guide)</title><description><![CDATA[Electronic Arts is granting Battlefield 6 access this weekend via Twitch Drops, eliminating preorder requirements. By watching any "Drops Enabled" stream for thirty minutes between August 7-8, players can earn a beta code for PC, PlayStation 5, or Xbox Series X/S. A second weekend follows, offering more chances to participate and unlock cosmetic rewards for the full game.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/esports/news/battlefield-6-beta-opens-today-here-is-how-to-grab-early-access-and-four-free-skins-through-twitch/articleshow/123170378.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/esports/news/battlefield-6-beta-opens-today-here-is-how-to-grab-early-access-and-four-free-skins-through-twitch/articleshow/123170378.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 21:59:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50954" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123170460,imgsize-50954.cms"/></item><item><title>1 lakh fake voters in Karnataka seat that BJP swept in 2024: Rahul Gandhi</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi alleges that over one lakh fake votes were cast in the Mahadevapura assembly seat, contributing to BJP's narrow victory in Bangalore Central. He accuses the Election Commission of colluding with the BJP to manipulate elections, demanding electronic voter data and CCTV footage as evidence. Gandhi urges judicial intervention, claiming a criminal fraud against the Constitution.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/1-lakh-fake-voters-in-karnataka-seat-that-bjp-swept-in-2024-rahul-gandhi/articleshow/123175972.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/1-lakh-fake-voters-in-karnataka-seat-that-bjp-swept-in-2024-rahul-gandhi/articleshow/123175972.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 04:42:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="783366" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175994,imgsize-783366.cms"/></item><item><title>Offset vs Cardi B: 'Upgrade' to Stefon Diggs questioned; fans outraged — breakup saga heats up</title><description><![CDATA[Offset, Cardi B's ex-husband, stirred controversy by seemingly commenting on her new relationship with Stefon Diggs during a podcast appearance. He suggested his exes haven't "upgraded" after leaving him, sparking outrage among fans who defended Cardi B's choices. Fans highlighted Cardi B's success and Diggs' athletic prowess, while neither Cardi B nor Diggs have responded to Offset's remarks.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/offset-questions-cardi-bs-upgrade-after-moving-on-with-stefon-diggs-sparking-outrage-among-fans/articleshow/123174829.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/offset-questions-cardi-bs-upgrade-after-moving-on-with-stefon-diggs-sparking-outrage-among-fans/articleshow/123174829.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 02:08:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="783215" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174835,imgsize-783215.cms"/></item><item><title>NDA authorises PM Modi, Nadda to finalise its VP candidate</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nda-authorises-pm-modi-nadda-to-finalise-its-vp-candidate/articleshow/123175578.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nda-authorises-pm-modi-nadda-to-finalise-its-vp-candidate/articleshow/123175578.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 04:08:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1142861" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175597,imgsize-1142861.cms"/></item><item><title>Dates for Putin's India visit 'almost' finalised, says Ajit Doval</title><description><![CDATA[NSA Ajit Doval's Moscow visit indicates India and Russia are nearing finalization of President Putin's India visit for the annual summit. Despite conflicting reports about the timing, discussions covered energy and defense cooperation. Doval expressed optimism that the Modi-Putin summit would enhance bilateral ties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/dates-for-putins-india-visit-almost-finalised-says-ajit-doval/articleshow/123174957.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/dates-for-putins-india-visit-almost-finalised-says-ajit-doval/articleshow/123174957.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 02:59:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="995673" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174958,imgsize-995673.cms"/></item><item><title>Pre-Onam heist: Coconut oil stolen; cash left untouched</title><description><![CDATA[Inspired by a past bank heist, a thief in Aluva targeted a grocery store for its valuable coconut oil, now priced like a luxury due to soaring costs. The attempted floor-drilling failed, but the thief managed to steal 30 litres of coconut oil and other items, ignoring cash and a charity box.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pre-onam-heist-coconut-oil-stolen-cash-left-untouched/articleshow/123174910.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pre-onam-heist-coconut-oil-stolen-cash-left-untouched/articleshow/123174910.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 02:28:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DISNEY TOM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="777592" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174914,imgsize-777592.cms"/></item><item><title>Lone candidate in fray? SC weighs NOTA option</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/lone-candidate-in-fray-sc-weighs-nota-option/articleshow/123176466.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/lone-candidate-in-fray-sc-weighs-nota-option/articleshow/123176466.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 05:23:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="577303" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123176507,imgsize-577303.cms"/></item><item><title>Field Marshal Sam Manekshaw, Brigadier Usman added to NCERT books</title><description><![CDATA[In a move to inspire students, the NCERT syllabus will now include chapters on Field Marshal Sam Manekshaw, Brigadier Mohammad Usman, and Major Somnath Sharma. These additions, across Urdu and English textbooks for classes VII and VIII, aim to instill values of courage and duty.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/field-marshal-sam-manekshaw-brigadier-usman-added-to-ncert-books/articleshow/123175909.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/field-marshal-sam-manekshaw-brigadier-usman-added-to-ncert-books/articleshow/123175909.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 04:37:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="411868" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175935,imgsize-411868.cms"/></item><item><title>Ceiling price of 4 emergency-use meds, retail price of 37 others capped</title><description><![CDATA[The government has capped prices for four emergency medicines. Retail prices are now fixed for 37 other drug formulations. This includes antibiotics and painkillers from specific companies. The National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA) issued the order. Companies must lower prices exceeding the ceiling. Manufacturers with lower prices should maintain them. This aims to make essential medicines more affordable.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ceiling-price-of-4-emergency-use-meds-retail-price-of-37-others-capped/articleshow/123175813.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ceiling-price-of-4-emergency-use-meds-retail-price-of-37-others-capped/articleshow/123175813.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 04:29:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1088802" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175853,imgsize-1088802.cms"/></item><item><title>Brazil's Lula dials PM Modi as Trump slaps 50% tariff on both nations</title><description><![CDATA[President Lula da Silva and PM Modi discussed the US tariffs impacting both Brazil and India, exploring deeper integration. Lula accepted Modi's invitation to visit India early next year, reinforcing India's upcoming BRICS presidency. Both leaders emphasized multilateralism amidst global challenges.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/brazils-lula-dials-pm-modi-as-trump-slaps-50-tariff-on-both-nations/articleshow/123174920.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/brazils-lula-dials-pm-modi-as-trump-slaps-50-tariff-on-both-nations/articleshow/123174920.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 02:33:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SACHIN PARASHAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1340805" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174926,imgsize-1340805.cms"/></item><item><title>SC junks Justice Varma plea challenging in-house probe</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-junks-justice-varma-plea-challenging-in-house-probe/articleshow/123175337.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-junks-justice-varma-plea-challenging-in-house-probe/articleshow/123175337.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 03:44:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="821900" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175378,imgsize-821900.cms"/></item><item><title>J&K: Crackdown on ‘seditious’ literature; police seize banned books</title><description><![CDATA[Police in Kashmir conducted coordinated raids, seizing allegedly subversive books from bookstores and literary venues, including the Chinar book festival. This action follows the J&K administration's ban of 25 titles deemed a threat to national unity. The crackdown has drawn sharp criticism from political and religious leaders, who argue it stifles free exchange and fuels division.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/crackdown-on-seditious-literature-in-jk-police-seize-banned-books/articleshow/123174301.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/crackdown-on-seditious-literature-in-jk-police-seize-banned-books/articleshow/123174301.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 00:39:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NASEER GANAI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1333744" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174303,imgsize-1333744.cms"/></item></channel></rss>
